instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]how to check with gpu need to be used on board when number is wiped?
threads.message: i have motherboard where gpu number is wiped and i want to replace for new one but half numbers are wiped. how do i check with one is correct one? board 820-2915-a  serial: c2qhk008drjd  emc 2417

threads.title: [SOLVED]how to check with gpu need to be used on board when number is wiped?
[SOLVED]how to check with gpu need to be used on board when number is wiped?
threads.message: 0005, slap a nice fake Chinese garbage GPU on there ;)

threads.title: [SOLVED]how to check with gpu need to be used on board when number is wiped?
threads.message:
hahahah. thx m8 :)
but how can i find out in future if this happen again?

threads.title: [SOLVED]how to check with gpu need to be used on board when number is wiped?
threads.message: appleserialnumberinfo.com. It says HD6750 which I know is 0005. 6770m is 0001 and 6490 is 0809000.

threads.title: [SOLVED]how to check with gpu need to be used on board when number is wiped?
threads.message: ok. good stuff m8. thx for your time and help.
